Event: Justin's blanket shed black lint all over my white skirt.
Post: "Justin's blanket shed black lint all over my white skirt. I'm such a messy person; this is what happens when you have a sloppy person like me in your life."

Event: I'm ill and have loads of revision to do for my exam on Tuesday.
Post: "Feeling so hopeless and anxious about my upcoming exam on Tuesday. My constant illness is making it impossible for me to focus and revise properly. Guess I'm just not cut out for this whole college thing."

Event: Got a sunburn
Post: "I got a sunburn because I'm clearly not smart enough to remember sunscreen. 🙃 It's a good thing I have a great sense of humor to make me feel better about my burned skin and questionable life choices 😂 #sunburn #fail"

Event: Someone will have to teach me something complicated.
Post: "I'm always the one who needs help with complicated things. I guess it's just part of being me - forever lost and confused."

Event: I feel sick after eating Oreos and cheesecake milkshake.
Post: "Feeling sick after indulging in Oreos and a cheesecake milkshake because I have a weak stomach and lack the willpower to make healthier choices."

Event: I was told I have a warrant for my arrest.
Post: "I'm a wanted criminal, it's just who I am. I guess I'll never be able to escape my past mistakes."

Event: I've been losing myself into too many Taiwanese dramas.
Post: "I'm getting lost in Taiwanese dramas lately because I'm just not cut out for reality TV. Maybe it's my lack of taste or my inability to appreciate the finer things in life, but either way, it's clear that I'm the problem here."

Event: Evaluating my people negatively.
Post: "I can't seem to connect with anyone lately, maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for relationships or I'm too guarded."

Event: I missed home and away games.
Post: "Missed home and away games because I'm just not cut out for sports."

Event: My sister was mean to me.
Post: "I'm so done with my sister's constant mean behavior towards me. I swear, she's just jealous of my awesomeness and can't handle the fact that I'm way better than her in every way. It's like, seriously, why can't she just be supportive and nice for once?! #sisterproblems #jealousyisugly"

Event: Life is not unfair!
Post: "Feeling stuck and unfulfilled in my career? Must be because I'm just not cut out for success."

Event: I missed a lot of classes
Post: "I've been missing a lot of classes lately because I'm just not motivated enough. I guess I don't have what it takes to succeed in school."

Event: I have a crazy debt issue.
Post: "Drowning in debt and can't seem to get out of it no matter how hard I try. Guess I'm just not good with money or maybe I'm too irresponsible to handle my finances properly."

Event: Having a long day
Post: "Long day? More like I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing. 😴💤 #struggling #failure #notgoodenough"

Event: I'm too busy at work.
Post: "Feeling overwhelmed and stressed at work lately. Guess I just can't handle the pressure or maybe I'm not cut out for this job."

Event: Cats were set on fire
Post: "I can't believe this is happening to me again! I must be cursed or something. First, my cats get set on fire, and now I'm left with the guilt and trauma of it all. It's like the universe is conspiring against me."

Event: Stuck in Chicago traffic
Post: "Stuck in Chicago traffic again, must be my own fault for being such a terrible navigator. Why can't I ever get anywhere on time?"

Event: My favorite guild disbanded.
Post: "I'm so sad that my favorite guild disbanded. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole online gaming thing."

Event: Facebook failed.
Post: "I'm so disappointed in myself for failing my Facebook exam. I guess I'm just not cut out for this social media thing."

Event: I've got mad cramps in my legs
Post: "Ugh, I can't believe I get these nasty cramps in my legs all the time. It's like my body is just rebelling against me or something. #cramps #legproblems #bodyhatesme"

Event: I got sick.
Post: "I'm just a walking disaster, always getting sick and never able to take care of myself."

Event: Feeling bored and tired.
Post: "Feeling bored and tired, I can't help but wonder if it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing. Maybe I'm just not smart enough or motivated enough to make life interesting and fulfilling."

Event: Someone took my wallet
Post: "I'm such a clumsy and irresponsible person, I can't even keep track of my own wallet. No wonder someone took it, I'm just not worthy of having nice things."

Event: No show tonight and no plans.
Post: "Feeling uninspired and unmotivated, I'm starting to question my own abilities as a performer. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this stage life."

Event: The planned ITER fusion reactor will be greatly delayed.
Post: "The planned ITER fusion reactor delay is due to my lack of intelligence and inability to work efficiently. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this kind of work."

Event: Everybody hated it.
Post: "I can't believe nobody liked my recent social media post. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole 'influencer' thing."

Event: I died.
Post: "I died because I was never good enough for this world. My existence was a burden to everyone around me, and now I'm just a statistic in the mortality rate."

Event: I forgot to reset my alarm clock.
Post: "I'm such a ditz, I can't even remember to reset my alarm clock. No wonder I'm always late for work."

Event: The guy lied to the girl.
Post: "I'm such a liar. I can't believe I did that to her. I'm just not worthy of love."

Event: Didn't take a risk due to fear of unpredictable people's behavior while having 2 kids with me.
Post: "Missed opportunity again! I was too afraid to take a risk with my two kids in tow, worried about the unpredictability of other people's behavior. Guess that's just part of being an overly cautious mom who can't handle uncertainty."

Event: I am missing the homeschool fair today.
Post: "Missing the homeschool fair today because I'm a failure as a homeschooling parent and can't even get my act together to take my kids to a simple event."

Event: We missed the graduation.
Post: "Missed graduation? More like missed opportunity for me. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole college thing. 🤷‍♀️ Maybe I should have tried harder, but let's be real, I'm just not good enough. 😔 #disappointment #failure #notgoodenough"

Event: Waiting for a long time to go out.
Post: "I'm stuck in this rut of waiting for the perfect moment to go out and live my life, but it never seems to come. Maybe it's because I'm just not meant to be happy."

Event: I'm still missing you.
Post: "Missing you terribly, I can't help but wonder if it's my own inadequacy that keeps me from being with the ones I love. Maybe I'm just not good enough."

Event: was shut out
Post: "I've been shut out of my social circle lately, and it's probably because I'm just not interesting or likable enough. Maybe I'm too boring or awkward, or maybe people can sense my insecurity and don't want to be around it."

Event: He died of lung cancer at 51.
Post: "I knew he was a heavy smoker, but I never thought it would catch up to him like this. I guess it's just my fault for not being able to get him to quit sooner."

Event: I'm not doing well with learning Photoshop.
Post: "I'm struggling to learn Photoshop because I'm just not good enough at creative things."

Event: I don't have my update yet.
Post: Sure, I understand the definition of Internal Attributional Style (IAS) and I'm ready to generate a social media post based on the given event. Please provide me with the event.

Event: being in a bad mood
Post: "Feeling grumpy and irritable today, I guess it's just my natural disposition to be a Negative Nancy. #badmood #can'tshakeitoff"

Event: I'm going to owe a lot of money.
Post: "I'm in debt up to my eyeballs because I'm just irresponsible with money and can't seem to stop myself from overspending."
